manifest.title: Intelligence, legislation and technology connected
paragraphs: HB Advisory is a strategy and intelligence platform created by Hudson Viana Borges, an executive with over 20 years across environmental sciences, agrochemicals, biotechnology and applied research.
We transform public and private data into actionable direction, with auditable pipelines, living documentation and close collaboration with client teams.

founder.title: Hudson Viana Borges
highlights: Veterinarian from University of Brasília with a Crop Protection specialization (UniFeob)
International programs in Advanced Toxicology (University of Guelph) and Regulatory Science (SCAHT)
Leadership roles at Syngenta, Bayer, Envu and Bioagri (Mérieux NutriSciences) across Latin America
Multicultural experience in Switzerland, Germany, USA, Canada, France, the UK and LATAM
founder.quote: HB Advisory embodies the maturity of a vision: intelligence as the bridge connecting science, legislation and technology — transforming information into direction and innovation into impact.

hero.title: HB Agro Intel — intelligence for agribusiness
hero.subtitle: We digitalize and unify the agro regulatory process, connecting data, teams and government in a transparent decision network.

context.title: The challenge
paragraphs: Fragmented data, ever-changing regulations and reliance on key experts increase risk and delays in product registration.
HB Agro Intel was designed to bring visibility, standardize flows and automate alerts throughout the regulatory pipeline.
